tools.name: athena-query
tools.description: A tool that executes SQL queries on data stored in S3 using Amazon Athena and retrieves the results. Only SELECT queries are allowed. Before executing a query, use athena-list-tables or athena-describe-table to check the table structure first.

query.description: The SQL query to execute (only SELECT statements are allowed)

database.description: The Glue Data Catalog database name

maxRows.description: Maximum number of rows to return (default: 100, max: 1000)

tools.name: athena-list-tables
tools.description: A tool that retrieves a list of tables and their schema information from a specified database in the Glue Data Catalog. Returns table names, column definitions, partition keys, data formats, and more. Use this tool to check the table structure before executing SQL queries.

database.description: The Glue Data Catalog database name

tools.name: athena-describe-table
tools.description: A tool that retrieves detailed schema information for a specified table, including column definitions, partition information, data format, SerDe information, and table parameters. Use this to build accurate SQL queries.

database.description: The Glue Data Catalog database name
